title: Valentina Textile Inc. Stretch Velvet (Turquoise Blue) Fabric by The Yard 60" Width
features: Rock the runway with this beautiful high fashion fabric.
This medium weight fabric features a beautiful sheen with a knit base and a velvet face side for a touch of luxury.
With 10% four-way stretch this fabric is perfect for form fitting tops shawls and scarves dancewear skirts dresses decorations and more!
description: Import Designation: Made in the korea import by valentina textile inc Fabric care instructions: Cold Handwash with Mild Soap preferably dry cleaned 58/60" wide. Fabric is sold by the yard and cut to order. For example, order of 1 yard (Qty=1) is 58'' x 36''. Order of 3 yards (Qty=3) is 58'' x 108''. Perfect for form fitting tops, shawls and scarves, dancewear, skirts, dresses, decorations and more! The possibilities are truly endless!
